landing.heroSubtitle: Portfolio. Services. Products. Bookings. All in one link.
landing.featuresSubtitle: A complete business website ‚Äî not a limited trial
landing.featurePortfolioDesc: Showcase your best work with a beautiful gallery. Let your skills speak for themselves.
landing.featureServicesDesc: Display all your services with prices and duration. Clients know exactly what to expect.
landing.featureBookingDesc: Accept appointments while you sleep. No more back-and-forth messages.
landing.featureProductsDesc: Sell hair care, skincare, or any products alongside your services.
landing.featureBrandingDesc: Custom colors, fonts, logo, and cover image. Make it uniquely yours.
landing.featureOneLinkDesc: Perfect for Instagram, Facebook, TikTok bio. All your info in one place.
landing.howItWorksSubtitle: No technical skills needed. Just sign up and customize.
landing.step1Desc: Sign up free and set up your business profile
landing.step2Desc: Upload photos, add services, set your hours
landing.step3Desc: Put your link everywhere and start getting bookings
landing.pricingSubtitle: We believe every beauty professional deserves a professional online presence
landing.pricingStandardDesc: Optional extras if you need them
landing.pricingWhyFreeDesc: We understand your profit margins are already tight. We don't want to take a cut of every order or charge you monthly fees just to exist online. That's why our complete business website is free. We only offer optional Pro features for businesses that want extra customization.
landing.comparisonSave: Save money. Save time. Look professional.
landing.testimonial1: Finally, I have a professional online presence without paying for an expensive website. My clients love how easy it is to book!
landing.testimonial2: I put my BeautiPick link in my Instagram bio and bookings started coming in immediately. Game changer!
landing.testimonial3: The gallery feature is perfect for showing my work. New clients can see exactly what I can do before booking.
landing.ctaTitle: Get Your FREE Business Website Now
landing.ctaSubtitle: Join 500+ beauty professionals already using BeautiPick. Unlimited bookings. Zero commissions. Forever.
landing.ctaNoCard: No credit card required ‚Ä¢ No hidden fees ‚Ä¢ Free forever

settings.title: Settings

settings.customDomainDesc: Use your own domain instead of {origin}
settings.minimumAdvanceBookingDesc: How far ahead customers must book
settings.maximumAdvanceBookingDesc: Maximum days in advance to book
settings.cancellationNoticeDesc: Hours before appointment customers can cancel
settings.qrCodeDesc: Display this QR code at your location so customers can quickly access your booking page
settings.qrCodePrintDesc: Print this QR code and display it at your reception, on flyers, or business cards. Customers can scan it to book instantly.
settings.linksDesc: Add social media and custom links
settings.designDesc: Customize the look of your booking page
settings.customDomainProFeature: Custom Domain is a Pro Feature
settings.customDomainProDescription: Connect your own domain (e.g., yoursalon.com) to create a professional branded booking page. Upgrade to Pro to unlock this feature.
settings.showBrandingDesc: Display BeautiPick branding in your booking page footer. Free users always show branding.
settings.showBrandingDescFree: Free users must display BeautiPick branding. Upgrade to Pro to remove it.

businessForm.customDomainSetup: How to set up your custom domain:
businessForm.customDomainStep1: Enter your domain name (e.g., yoursalon.com) above and save
businessForm.customDomainStep2: Go to your domain provider's DNS settings (e.g., GoDaddy, Namecheap, Cloudflare)
businessForm.customDomainStep3: Add the following DNS records exactly as shown below
businessForm.youtubeVideoDesc: Add a YouTube video to showcase your salon on your booking page.
